channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description:
hello, i have a D-link WBR 1310 router and i am having trouble portforwarding my server. i have my no-ip set up, and i allowed the port 43594 to my firewall but it still wont work and its driving me crazy!
please someone help me fill out the port the right way or tell me what im doing wrong
i put moparscape as the application name, made teh traffic type to TCP, and i activated the ports so i dont know what im doing wrong.
p.s i have tried portforward.com, and it doesnt work, and theres no mopar guides for d-link router

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Your best bet would be to give your ISP a ring and ask what is going on. Do not mention anything with a Runescape private server, just say you wish to host a Java application you wrote, but you cannot accept any connections from somewhere that is not on your local binding IP.

Read full topic
